theme: Professional, innovative, trustworthy with blues and greens, clean modern SaaS design.

spacing.notes: Use Tailwind spacing classes like p-4, m-6, gap-8

effects.glassmorphism: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium hover:bg-blue-700 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-blue-600 px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium border border-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-50 transition-all duration-300

components.navigation: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 border-b border-gray-200 px-6 py-4

forms.input: border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500
forms.label: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2

imagery.style: Modern minimalist photography with clean lines and soft gradients
imagery.color_treatment: Predominantly blues (#3b82f6) and greens (#10b981) with neutral backgrounds, subtle teal (#06b6d4) accents
imagery.composition: Spacious layouts with clear focal points, balanced elements, and ample white space

guidelines.hero_images: Wide panoramic tech landscapes or abstract data visualizations, bright and optimistic lighting
guidelines.feature_images: Conceptual illustrations or simplified photos representing user research features, clean compositions
guidelines.decorative: Abstract geometric patterns or subtle gradients complementing the blue-green palette
guidelines.team_photos: Professional headshots with natural lighting and neutral backgrounds
guidelines.product_shots: Clean UI mockups or product photography on white or light gray backgrounds

imagery.avoid: Stock photo clich√©s, overly busy compositions, colors that clash with the blue-green palette

design_notes: Design system created autonomously based on specified theme. Focused on clean, modern SaaS aesthetics with trust-building blues and innovative greens. Inter typography for readability. Glassmorphism and subtle effects for modern feel.
